title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.6 - Landing areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.6 - Landing areas

State Regulations

All vehicles operating on active landing areas, except those
especially authorized by the manager, shall have prior permission and be
equipped with a functioning two-way radio tuned to ground control frequency, or
escorted by a vehicle so equipped. In addition, between the hours of sunset and
sunrise such vehicles shall have an overhead amber light. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
